mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT (EMAIL,P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER,P_NAME,P_EMAIL,P_PRICE,P_OK,P_SEND_CONFIRM,P_CURRENTAMOUNT,P_SPONSOR_COUNT,P_ENROLL_DATE) VALUES (#{email},SEQ_P_NUM.NEXTVAL,(select count(*) from project where EMAIL = #{email})+1,#{name},#{email},0,'0','F',0,0,SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE EMAIL = #{userId}

SELECT EMAIL, P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER, P_TITLE, P_REP_IMG, P_SUMMARY, P_CATEGORY, P_PROFILE_IMG, P_NAME, P_INTRODUCE, P_PRICE, P_END_DATE, P_GIFT_ITEM, P_REFUND, P_DESCRIPTION_VIDEO, P_STORY, P_EMAIL, P_PHONE, P_BANK_TRADING, P_BANK_NAME, P_BANK_NUMBER, P_BANK_KINDS, P_OK, P_SEND_CONFIRM, P_CURRENTAMOUNT,P_SPONSOR_COUNT,P_ENROLL_DATE FROM PROJECT ORDER BY P_SPONSOR_COUNT DESC

SELECT EMAIL, P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER, P_TITLE, P_REP_IMG, P_SUMMARY, P_CATEGORY, P_PROFILE_IMG, P_NAME, P_INTRODUCE, P_PRICE, P_END_DATE, P_GIFT_ITEM, P_REFUND, P_DESCRIPTION_VIDEO, P_STORY, P_EMAIL, P_PHONE, P_BANK_TRADING, P_BANK_NAME, P_BANK_NUMBER, P_BANK_KINDS, P_OK, P_SEND_CONFIRM, P_CURRENTAMOUNT,P_SPONSOR_COUNT,P_ENROLL_DATE FROM ( SELECT EMAIL, P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER, P_TITLE, P_REP_IMG, P_SUMMARY, P_CATEGORY, P_PROFILE_IMG, P_NAME, P_INTRODUCE, P_PRICE, P_END_DATE, P_GIFT_ITEM, P_REFUND, P_DESCRIPTION_VIDEO, P_STORY, P_EMAIL, P_PHONE, P_BANK_TRADING, P_BANK_NAME, P_BANK_NUMBER, P_BANK_KINDS, P_OK, P_SEND_CONFIRM, P_CURRENTAMOUNT,P_SPONSOR_COUNT,P_ENROLL_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY P_CATEGORY ORDER BY P_SPONSOR_COUNT DESC) as RowIdx FROM PROJECT ) WHERE RowIdx Between 1 and 5 AND P_OK=2

SELECT * FROM (SELECT EMAIL, P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER, P_TITLE, P_REP_IMG, P_SUMMARY, P_CATEGORY, P_PROFILE_IMG, P_NAME, P_INTRODUCE, P_PRICE, P_END_DATE, P_GIFT_ITEM, P_REFUND, P_DESCRIPTION_VIDEO, P_STORY, P_EMAIL, P_PHONE, P_BANK_TRADING, P_BANK_NAME, P_BANK_NUMBER, P_BANK_KINDS, P_OK, P_SEND_CONFIRM, P_CURRENTAMOUNT,P_SPONSOR_COUNT,P_ENROLL_DATE, ROWNUM AS R_NUM FROM (SELECT EMAIL, P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER, P_TITLE, P_REP_IMG, P_SUMMARY, P_CATEGORY, P_PROFILE_IMG, P_NAME, P_INTRODUCE, P_PRICE, P_END_DATE, P_GIFT_ITEM, P_REFUND, P_DESCRIPTION_VIDEO, P_STORY, P_EMAIL, P_PHONE, P_BANK_TRADING, P_BANK_NAME, P_BANK_NUMBER, P_BANK_KINDS, P_OK, P_SEND_CONFIRM, P_CURRENTAMOUNT,P_SPONSOR_COUNT,P_ENROLL_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY P_CATEGORY ORDER BY P_SPONSOR_COUNT DESC) AS ROWIDX FROM PROJECT) WHERE ROWIDX Between 1 and 5) WHERE R_NUM BETWEEN #{btnIdx} AND (#{btnIdx} + 3) AND P_OK =2

SELECT EMAIL, P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER, P_TITLE, P_REP_IMG, P_SUMMARY, P_CATEGORY, P_PROFILE_IMG, P_NAME, P_INTRODUCE, P_PRICE, P_END_DATE, P_GIFT_ITEM, P_REFUND, P_DESCRIPTION_VIDEO, P_STORY, P_EMAIL, P_PHONE, P_BANK_TRADING, P_BANK_NAME, P_BANK_NUMBER, P_BANK_KINDS, P_OK, P_SEND_CONFIRM, P_CURRENTAMOUNT, P_SPONSOR_COUNT FROM PROJECT WHERE P_PROJECT_CODE = #{projectCode}
SELECT * FROM PROJECT WHERE P_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR P_CATEGORY LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
SELECT * FROM PROJECT WHERE P_CATEGORY LIKE '%' || #{category} || '%'
SELECT * FROM PROJECT WHERE P_STORY LIKE '%' || #{tag} || '%' OR P_NAME LIKE '%' || #{tag} || '%'
SELECT * FROM PROJECT WHERE P_OK= 2 ORDER BY (P_END_DATE - SYSDATE)
SELECT * FROM PROJECT WHERE P_OK= 2 ORDER BY P_ENROLL_DATE DESC

SELECT * from(select EMAIL, P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER, P_TITLE, P_REP_IMG, P_SUMMARY, P_CATEGORY, P_PROFILE_IMG, P_NAME, P_INTRODUCE, P_PRICE, P_END_DATE, P_GIFT_ITEM, P_REFUND, P_DESCRIPTION_VIDEO, P_STORY, P_EMAIL, P_PHONE, P_BANK_TRADING, P_BANK_NAME, P_BANK_NUMBER, P_BANK_KINDS, P_OK, P_SEND_CONFIRM, P_CURRENTAMOUNT,P_SPONSOR_COUNT,P_ENROLL_DATE , ROWNUM AS R_NUM FROM ( SELECT EMAIL, P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER, P_TITLE, P_REP_IMG, P_SUMMARY, P_CATEGORY, P_PROFILE_IMG, P_NAME, P_INTRODUCE, P_PRICE, P_END_DATE, P_GIFT_ITEM, P_REFUND, P_DESCRIPTION_VIDEO, P_STORY, P_EMAIL, P_PHONE, P_BANK_TRADING, P_BANK_NAME, P_BANK_NUMBER, P_BANK_KINDS, P_OK, P_SEND_CONFIRM, P_CURRENTAMOUNT,P_SPONSOR_COUNT,P_ENROLL_DATE FROM PROJECT ORDER BY P_ENROLL_DATE DESC)) WHERE R_NUM BETWEEN #{btnIdx1} AND (#{btnIdx1} + 3) AND P_OK =2
